textAfterTable: Summary Running Back Rank: #149 All Players: #597 Miller was the starting fullback for the 49ers last year and served the role pretty well. He didn't get many rush attempts but made some plays in the passing game, catching 18 passes for 189 yards and two scores. Miller catches the ball pretty well for a fullback and can be another option in the passing game for the 49ers. Miller's biggest asset to the offense is as a blocker, a role he serves well. He won't get many touches offensively but the occasional reception. FANTASY OUTLOOK Miller scored a few times last year but you just never know when those scores are going to come. He is a reach for fantasy teams. He could improve his reception totals some from last year but don't expect a monster jump in catches. He can get around 25 catches with a score or two. comments about Bruce Miller Notes Nov 26 05:53 pm San Francisco 49ers TE Derek Carrier (foot), OT Anthony Davis (concussion) and DT Glenn Dorsey (forearm) have been ruled out for Week 13 against the
